attributes.action: Educate children in school not to be litter bugs
attributes.additional_details:
Please educate children from a primary age up to and including secondary schooling that it is unacceptable to just throw their litter away.

Even a little thing like not throwing litter away and taking it home with you or throwing it in a bin show some mark of respect that is sadly lacking today.

Even if it is only a teacher telling their class at register once a week that littering is wrong and it stops 25% of future littering this would be a benefit to all the country, government, nature and public and help cut council costs.
